message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're extending an exclusive offer of $110 for this item. We're confident it will meet your needs and expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but $110 feels a bit steep for me. Would you consider a lower price, perhaps around $85?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, we've decided to counter with a price of $95. We hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value of the product.
